topic.title: Database Configuration for DITA WebHelp with Feedback

body.p: In case you run the webhelp-feedback transformation, you need to configure the database that holds the user comments. The instructions for configuring the database are presented in the instalation.html file, located at [DITA-map-base-dir]/out/[transtype]/oxygen-webhelp/resources. The instalation.html file is created by the transformation process.
